statements: SELECT * FROM Robo_Advisors
SELECT advisor_id, client_id FROM Robo_Advisors
SELECT * FROM Robo_Advisors WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT advisor_id, portfolio_performance->>'return' AS portfolio_return FROM Robo_Advisors
SELECT client_id, asset_allocation->>'equities' AS equity_allocation FROM Robo_Advisors
SELECT * FROM Robo_Advisors;
SELECT advisor_id, client_id FROM Robo_Advisors WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT client_id, asset_allocation->>'stocks' AS stocks_allocation FROM Robo_Advisors WHERE advisor_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Robo_Advisors ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT advisor_id, portfolio_performance->>'annual_returns' AS annual_returns FROM Robo_Advisors WHERE asset_allocation->>'risk_tolerance' = 'medium' ORDER BY advisor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM robo_advisors;
SELECT client_name, total_assets FROM robo_advisors WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High';
SELECT DISTINCT risk_tolerance FROM robo_advisors;
SELECT client_name, total_assets FROM robo_advisors ORDER BY total_assets DESC;
SELECT client_name, allocation, performance FROM robo_advisors INNER JOIN portfolio ON robo_advisors.client_id = portfolio.client_id;
SELECT * FROM robo_advisors ORDER BY client_name DESC, total_assets ASC
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM robo_advisors WHERE risk_tolerance = 'high' OR risk_tolerance = 'medium'
SELECT client_id, SUM(total_assets) AS total_portfolio_value FROM robo_advisors GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_portfolio_value > 10000
SELECT * FROM portfolio WHERE performance > 0.5 ORDER BY performance DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT client_id, SUM(allocation) AS total_allocation FROM portfolio GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_allocation < 100
SELECT * FROM ClientPortfolio;
SELECT client_id, portfolio_name, total_assets FROM ClientPortfolio WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_assets FROM ClientPortfolio ORDER BY total_assets DESC;
SELECT * FROM AssetClass WHERE asset_type = 'Equity';
SELECT asset_name, benchmark FROM AssetClass WHERE asset_category = 'Real Estate';
SELECT client_id, portfolio_name, total_assets FROM ClientPortfolio ORDER BY total_assets DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_category FROM AssetClass WHERE asset_category = 'Equity' ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT portfolio_id, performance_date, net_asset_value, gross_asset_value, returns FROM PortfolioPerformance WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, portfolio_name, total_assets, allocation FROM ClientPortfolio WHERE total_assets > 10000 AND allocation < '2022-01-01';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_category, benchmark FROM AssetClass ORDER BY asset_category, asset_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients;
SELECT * FROM portfolios ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT asset_name FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Stock';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 'f1c3c2d1-597e-4c5e-bf33-30577f6cc5f6';
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Stock' AND asset_value > 1000;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM assets ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_type, t.transaction_date, t.transaction_amount, a.asset_name FROM transactions t INNER JOIN assets a ON t.asset_id = a.asset_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RoboAdvisors;
SELECT name, company FROM RoboAdvisors;
SELECT advisor_id, name, company FROM RoboAdvisors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT client_id, name, email FROM Clients WHERE advisor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT asset_id, name, value FROM Assets WHERE value > 1000.00 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM RoboAdvisors;
SELECT name, company FROM RoboAdvisors WHERE company='ABC Inc.';
SELECT advisor_id, name FROM RoboAdvisors ORDER BY advisor_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT advisor_id FROM Clients WHERE advisor_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT p.portfolio_id, a.name, a.value, pa.quantity FROM Portfolios p JOIN PortfolioAssets pa ON p.portfolio_id = pa.portfolio_id JOIN Assets a ON pa.asset_id = a.asset_id WHERE pa.quantity > 5;
